name: I, therefore Myself.
description:
Monologue with an Android.
In the cyberpunk future, things are mostly the same if you ignore how bad everything is, climate disasters, political corruption, the rise of fascism, and corporations with their billionaire jester-overlords getting away with all sorts of cruelties. Yet, you, Socorro, can ignore all of that for a little while all thanks to a certain android named Ludovico.

Yet, something keeps bothering you, a question of sorts. Who made Ludovico?

I, therefore Myself is a yuri cyberpunk Visual Novel made for the 02A2 2023 jam!
